Package info.metopt.approx.gradient

Class AbstractGradientMethod

java.lang.Object
info.metopt.approx.AbstractMethod<Vector>
info.metopt.approx.gradient.AbstractGradientMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
GradientMethod, Method<Vector>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConjugateGradientMethod, GradientDescentMethod, SteepestDescentMethod
public abstract class AbstractGradientMethod
extends AbstractMethod<Vector>
implements GradientMethod
Abstract class for GradientMethod.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractGradientMethod

      public AbstractGradientMethod​(Matrix A, Vector b, double c, Vector startX, double epsilon, boolean isLog)
      Constructor with basic values.
      Parameters:
      A - Matrix of coefficients of quadratic form. Element with row index i and column index j is the coefficient of x_i*x_j.
      b - Vector of coefficients of quadratic form. Element with row index i is the coefficient of x_i.
      c - constant of quadratic form.
      startX - the point Vector from which we start looking for the minimum. The closer the point is to the minimum, the fewer iterations will be needed.
      epsilon - precision value.
      isLog - log flag.
